text: Hi Samuel! I'm Red Bull Chatbot and I can connect you to talk with our awesome athletes.
If you find and talk to all four of our Red Bull F1 race team members, you can win VIP access to the Monaco Cocktail Club 2016!

payload.text: So, you wan't to talk with Daniel Ricciardo, our Red Bull F1 race team member?

text: Hey mate! Great to see you here in Monaco! I'm Daniel Ricciardo, but you can call me Dan.
I'm originally from Perth, Western Australia, but currently I live here in Monaco.

I remember in 2014 when I got to the podium in Monaco I came back to my house with the trophy and champagne and sat there thinking I just
      had an F1 race an hour ago and now I’m sat in my house, this is weird.
You traveled all the way here? You are a true fan of F1! How do you like the track here?
I'm myself quite a fan of Monaco. I believe street circuits bring out the best in a driver. It’s visible to the spectators who is running the fine line between risk and reward.
To get me going for this race, I did a challenge with Bath rugby team, check this out!
I was so sure I could push those guys out of my way!
Now I have to get going, but it was great chatting with you Samuel. Wave for me when I drive by. :)
